content: a super cute baby beanie you ll find that these beanies fly off the hook make them as gifts for your market stall or for charity pair them with a pretty filet baby blanket top them with a pom pom and add earflaps for some extra cuteness use one or more colours to add your personal touch to the design ***please note my stitches are quite tall if your beanies are turning out a little short please substitute double_crochet rounds for half_double_crochet rounds *** instructions for a number of design variations are provided the pattern mostly uses beginner worthy double_crochet and chain stitches any dk/ 8ply acrylic cotton wool or mixed fibre yarn can be used beanie size can be adjusted by using a thinner or thicker yarn other resizing tips provided in the pattern document you can make a matching adult beanie with the vintage vibes beanie pattern https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/vintage-vibes-beanie i hope you enjoy making these cute little hats remember to add your project on ravelry and #vintagevibesbabybeanie your posts on social media so i can see all of your lovely makes
